Data Journalism Diary Introduction and Motivation Goals

Data Journalism Diary Ana Goodwin 2021-10-14 Introduction and Motivation This R book will be used to show my work as a work through UT Austin’s “Reporting With Data” class taught by Christian McDonald. This book is not a required component of the class, but rather a personal project I wanted to do for myself to give me a place to track my progress and also allow me to build upon the concepts I learn in class. Goals I want to achieve the following goals with this book: To give myself a place to practice and develop my skills on my own To keep track of my progress in order to see how far I have come in my data journalism journey To demonstrate my abilities as a data journalist by sharing my code
